privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your data protection and privacy rights

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At Kanbun, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information in accordance with GDPR regulations.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: When you join our waitlist, we collect: your email address, preferred language, date of registration, and technical information (browser user-agent, IP address) for security purposes.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUse.content: We use your email address solely to notify you about Kanbun's launch and send relevant updates about our JLPT preparation platform. We will never sell your data to third parties.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.content: Your data is securely stored on Supabase servers located in the European Union, ensuring GDPR compliance. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to: access your data, request correction or deletion, withdraw consent at any time, and lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@kanbun.co

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@kanbun.co
